educationList.major: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science â€¢ Cumulative GPA 3.96/4.00 â€¢ Honors Program â€¢ Faculty Honors â€¢ Thesis (in progress): Comprehensive Deep Inference on Animal Behavior and One-photon Calcium Imaging (Advisor: Chethan Pandarinath)

workExpList.work_desc: Undergraduate Research Assistant. Lead the development of RADICaL 1p and coordinate the lab's collaboration with experimental labs on calcium imaging.

Research Intern. Conducted research on the effect of candidate drugs on mice with Dystonia and Parkinson's Disease with deep learning models. Developed a comparative analysis pipeline for synchronous one-photon calcium imaging data and animal behavior data. Improved the internet infrastructure of data storage and transform among labs.

Software Engineer Intern in cloud computing. Maintained the voice cloud database of Iflytek under the structure of Hadoop and Scala-based Spark. Developed a data extraction platform for cloud database end users and wrote solidified data extraction process in company wiki.

projectList.project_desc: A deep learning tool based on LFADS, a sequential model with RNN-based variational auto-encoder to infer brain neural activities from noisy one-photon calcium imaging data
projectList.project_content: Design and implement the deep learning model on Tensorflow 2. Perform data cleaning on raw data, test the model and analyze result data to check the performance.

projectList.project_desc: A cloud computing platform developed by Iflytek to maintain, process and visualize mass business data.
projectList.project_content: Developed a self-service data extraction platform in Odeon for the company's research and business departments based on Apache Zeppelin. This platfrom enabled end users to self-extract data from Odeon easily.
